rep.text: Ha, ha, ha! And you are here to challenge me? You are only alive because I wanted to see who dares to challenge me like that!
I don't want to fight you. You could just give me the piece of map you have and I will be able to leave this world.
The Cursed Map? Is that what you're after? And I am to hand you a relic we've been holding on to for generations? This will not happen.
You don't really need it for anything, do you?
Leave on your own or I will get you thrown out of my village!
